thread.title: Trade tensions set to dominate G20

title: Trade tensions set to dominate G20
text:
Trade tensions set to dominate G20 Monday, March 19, 2018 - 01:46 
Worries about the potential for a U.S.-China trade war and frustration over U.S. President Donald Trump's steel and aluminum tariffs are threatening to dominate at the G20 gathering of finance leaders in Buenos Aires this week. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Worries about the potential for a U.S.-China trade war and frustration over U.S. President Donald Trump's steel and aluminum tariffs are threatening to dominate at the G20 gathering of finance leaders in Buenos Aires this week.
